Author: HappyCrypto
Title: [ANN][ICO] Connectius Token - Connectius E-Commerce SaaS Platform ICO 05.11
Body: Hello, Rhino! The Connectius.Core platform forms the basis of the Connectius Ecosystem. The main task of the platform is to service partner applications. The platform architecture will consist of the following modules: API for interaction with the platform; User account database; Module for service requests handling; Smart contracts and distributed registers; Arbiter and oracle; Interactive map and geolocation data processing; Payment support and token transfer; and User ratings. The Partner Institute Applications will be developed within the framework of the Ecosystem. Connectius.Experts application will be the first application in the Connectius Ecosystem (proof-of-concept). This application will be an aggregate of consumers, craftsmen and merchants, providing all kinds of services. The mobile application will be developed for two operating systems: Android and iOS. Currently, there are no plans to develop any other application.

Author: filsid
Title: [ANN][ICO] Connectius Token - Connectius E-Commerce SaaS Platform ICO 05.11
Body: Due to the upcoming holiday season the vast majority of venture capital funds we are currently working with are unplugging from work for two weeks. To maintain maximum productivity, we’ve decided to extend Connectius token sales until January 20, 2018.  Connectius ICO News. We extend our ICO until January 20, 2018 Due to the upcoming holiday season in the USA the vast majority of venture capital funds we are currently working with are unplugging from work for two weeks. To maintain maximum productivity, we’ve decided to extend Connectius token sales until January 20, 2018.  Furthermore, we have fixed a token price at 1 USD during the whole ICO period. If you’ve already purchased tokens at a price higher than 1 USD, the corresponding amount of tokens will be transferred to your wallet. If you’ve purchased tokens for a lesser price or for 1 USD, your account balance will remain the same. We are happy to answer any further questions you may have in our official social media groups.  ICO Sales end on January 20, 2018.  https://medium.com/@connectius/connectius-ico-news-we-extend-our-ico-until-january-20-2018-815ed483a0e9

Author: HappyCrypto
Title: [ANN][ICO] Connectius Token - Connectius E-Commerce SaaS Platform ICO 05.11
Body: Connectius is Blockchain as a service solution, that can be easily integrated in the any existing e-commerce. The main goal of the project is to help any e-commerce store to save money they lose on fraud transactions. Our service allows any e-commerce store to deal with their Consumers using a smart-contract. It guarantees to have less froud for the store and makes transactions more secure for the consumers. By reducing the expenses on fraud any e-commerce can reduce the costs of its goods/services for the consumer and become more competitive on the market. With the help of the Connectius model we create the universal discount system for all the e-commerce worldwide and provide the user acquisition. To show how our solution works, we are launching our proof-of-concept e-commerce platform. It is a marketplace, just like TaskRabbit. In it, consumers will be able to find craftsmen, merchants, or any other specialists to execute a routine job.

Title: [ANN][ICO] Connectius Token - Connectius E-Commerce SaaS Platform ICO 05.11
Body: Hey folks, selling connectius.eth if anyone is interested in buying it,  Here is the link on the ENS registrar: https://registrar.ens.domains/#connectius   An ENS is something like your personal wallet address name, instead of using the 0x address name, you can send your ETH coins and tokens to connectius.eth directly.    Anyone interested please PM me an offer and Ill list it either on ENSlisting or on Namebazaar.io for a fully decentralised or 100% escrow trade  Thanks!    PS: More about ENS an can be found here - A post by Ethereum's Nick Johnson https://medium.com/the-ethereum-name-service/a-beginners-guide-to-buying-an-ens-domain-3ccac2bdc770

Body: As part of the creation and development, Connectius ecosystems will be ready to take on service requests in the SaaS subscription format. By subscription, certain services will be provided, namely: *Access to the API for interaction with the platform; *Access to the database of user accounts; *Finding and comparing the access processor *Request for service; *Arbitration and Oracle *Interactive map and processing of geolocation data; *Support payments and transfers of tokens; *User ratings.

Author: solid.god
Title: [ANN][ICO] Connectius Token - Connectius E-Commerce SaaS Platform ICO 05.11
Body: Our blockchain-based solution will fulfill the following tasks: •  Reduce the overall impact of fraud Problem: Up to 8% of the revenues had been lost due to fraud last year*. Solution: Blockchains can completely eliminate types of fraud such as chargeback fraud and card-not-present fraud and reduce the impact of other types. •  Improve the efficiency of the current processing system Problem: In last year, almost 40% of all transaction attempts were fraud*. Solution: Eliminating card-not-present fraud will reduce the instances of attempted fraud in transactions. •  Reduce operational expenses for fraud management Problem: In last year, a typical e-commerce spent nearly 5% of their revenue or nearly 25% of OpEX to Fraud Management*. Solution: Eliminating card-not-present fraud and chargeback fraud will reduce the cost of Fraud management. •  Remove confidence issues Problem: As soon as there is no chargeback by design, transferring money to someone you can’t trust can make you feel apprehensive. Solution: All deals are processed by smart contracts, so fair refunds are still an option. •  Reduce the CAPEX for blockchain integration Problem: A blockchain and smart contracts developing integration needs a lot of funds and efforts Solution: A set of secure smart contracts and blockchain integration modules will be developed and ready to use via external APIs.
